wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas James Miller (born 4 January 1970) is a British weather forecaster who is working for the BBC. He joined the team at the BBC Weather Centre in London in January 2007, and can now be seen presenting on BBC News, BBC World News, BBC Radio 4 and BBC One. He appears regularly on the BBC News at One the BBC News at Six and BBC News at Ten.

response: Within the last few minutes of each bulletin, a full national weather forecast is presented by Helen Willetts, Alina Jenkins, Susan Powell or Louise Lear of the BBC Weather centre. The final full national weather forecast on the BBC News at Six, broadcast from Studio TC7, was presented by Nick Miller.

link_mentions.page: List of current BBC newsreaders and reporters

response: *Nick Miller (American football) (born 1987), American football wide receiver
*Nick Miller (wrestler) (born 1985), ring name for Australian professional wrestler Mike Nicholls
* Nick Miller (New Girl), a fictional character in the television sitcom New Girl

Keith-Lucas joined the Met Office in 2007 and started presenting forecasts for BBC Weather in 2008. She has done the five-day weather forecast on the BBC One series Countryfile. She also presents occasional weather-based documentaries on the BBC News and BBC World News channels Climate Check and Weather World, which she co-presents with Nick Miller, and once included an item for children about making a rain gauge she presented along with her son Oscar.
**Nick Miller, British meteorologist for BBC; in Denham, Buckinghamshire
